articles.title: The lowdown on the Hypercar class at the 2023 24 Hours of Le Mans - 24 Heures du Mans
articles.description: Hypercar is the top class with the fastest cars at this year's 24 Hours of Le Mans. Find out all you need to know to keep track of them as they clock up the laps!
articles.content:
1. Hypercar: definition
A Hypercar will win the Centenary race. But will it be a Toyota, Ferrari, Cadillac, Porsche, Peugeot, Glickenhaus or Vanwall? Its race number will be shown in white on a red … [+2005 chars]
